problems.title: X Pattern
problems.description:
Write a program to print an X pattern of stars of height n (where n is odd).

Input Format:
A single odd integer n.

Output Format:
Print the pattern as shown in the examples. Ensure there are no trailing spaces.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
3

Sample Output
* *
 *
* *

Explanation:
An X pattern of height 3 is printed.
hintsList: Print star if row index equals column index or row + col equals n + 1.
